ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class LightLocalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.Navigation
      • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.PlainNavigation
        • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.LightLocalizer

  • public class LightLocalizer
extends PlainNavigation
    localises the robot using colour sensors to detect lines arranged in a grid in order to localise angle and position.

      • localize

        public void localize(int x,
                     int y,
                     double theta)
        tells the robot to localise and set the given point as its given location.
        Parameters:
        x - position to localize to.
        y - position to localize to.
        theta - angle to set at end of localization.
